_meta.description: Extended color palette for OmniDesign - 16 color families with 11 shades each (50-950)

neutral.description: Pure grayscale for UI structure - backgrounds, borders, text

500.$description: Neutral base shade - icons, secondary text

950.$description: Darkest - near black, high contrast text

slate.description: Cool gray with subtle blue undertone - modern tech aesthetic

zinc.description: True neutral gray - balanced without color bias
zinc.usage: Neutral UI, Swiss design, minimalist interfaces

stone.description: Warm gray with subtle brown undertone - organic, editorial feel
stone.usage: Editorial content, organic brands, warm interfaces

red.description: Error states, destructive actions, warnings, alerts
red.usage: Danger, error messages, delete buttons, critical alerts

orange.usage: CTAs, warnings, energy, creative interfaces, autumn themes

amber.description: Caution, gold, yellow-orange - warning and highlights
amber.usage: Warnings, gold themes, highlights, star ratings, caution states

lime.usage: Nature, eco, spring, freshness, alternative to pure green

green.description: Success, growth, nature, confirmation, positive actions
green.usage: Success states, confirmations, go buttons, nature, money

emerald.description: Natural, refined green - premium organic aesthetic
emerald.usage: Premium eco brands, wellness, sophisticated nature themes

teal.description: Calm, trustworthy, medical, professional - balanced cyan-green
teal.usage: Medical, finance, trust, professional services, balanced brands

cyan.usage: Tech startups, modern apps, fresh interfaces, water themes

sky.description: Light, airy, open - gentle blue for relaxed interfaces
sky.usage: Weather apps, open interfaces, light themes, daytime

blue.description: Primary, corporate, trustworthy - the universal brand color
blue.usage: Primary brand color, links, corporate themes, trust

indigo.usage: Premium brands, professional services, sophisticated tech

violet.description: Creative, magical, imaginative - purple with energy
violet.usage: Creative brands, imagination, magic, art, spiritual themes

purple.description: Premium, luxury, royalty, sophistication - deep purple
purple.usage: Luxury brands, premium services, royal themes, night

fuchsia.usage: Fun brands, youth, nightlife, party, vibrant interfaces

pink.description: Warm, friendly, feminine, caring - approachable pink
pink.usage: Healthcare, feminine brands, caring services, love themes

rose.description: Soft, elegant, romantic - sophisticated warm pink
rose.usage: Romance, beauty, elegant feminine, soft aesthetics

text-inverted.$description: Text on light surfaces in dark mode
